questions.question_text: Complete the sentence. The Enterprise Continuum provides methods for classifying architecture artifacts as they evolve from ____________________.

choices.D: Solutions Architectures to Solution Building Blocks
choices.C: Foundation Architectures to re-usable architecture assets
choices.A: generic architectures to reusable Solution Building Blocks

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
From generic to Specific

Selected Answer: B
B is correct answer (wording is slightly different in pubs): generic Foundation Architectures to Organization-Specific Architectures

The Enterprise Continuum provides methods for classifying architecture and solution artifacts, both internal and external to the Architecture Repository, as they evolve from generic Foundation Architectures to Organization-Specific Architectures.

Selected Answer: B
B is correct - generic Foundation Architectures to Organization-Specific Architectures.

B is correct as part of arch continuum its foundation arch --> common system arch--> industry arch--> org specific arch and foundation arch is generic in nature from whom more specific arch are derived

Selected Answer: C
https://pubs.opengroup.org/togaf-standard/adm-techniques/chap08.html
8.1 Introduction
Understanding the readiness of the organization to accept change, identifying the issues, and then dealing with them in the Implementation and Migration Plans is key to successful architecture transformation in Phases E and F. This will be a joint effort between corporate (especially human resources) staff, lines of business, and IT planners.

https://pubs.opengroup.org/togaf-standard/adm-techniques/chap08.html

" 8.1 Introduction
 
Understanding the readiness of the organization to accept change, identifying the issues, and then dealing with them in the Implementation and Migration Plans is key to successful architecture transformation in Phases E and F. This will be a joint effort between corporate (especially human resources) staff, lines of business, and IT planners. "

choices.B: widely used to validate an architecture that is being developed
choices.D: to ensure the active support of powerful stakeholders
choices.A: a way to put building blocks into context, thereby supporting re-usable solutions
choices.C: a joint effort between corporate staff, lines of business, and IT planners

questions.question_text: Complete the sentence. Business Transformation Readiness Assessment is ________.

choices.B: Determining the scope of an architecture compliance review
choices.D: Conducting assessments of the maturity level of architecture discipline within the organization

questions.question_text: Which of the following is a responsibility of an Architecture Board?

choices.D: A method for developing an organization-specific enterprise architecture
choices.B: A classification mechanism for architectures and solutions
choices.C: A process for managing and controlling change at an enterprise-wide level
choices.A: A process for managing architecture requirements

questions.question_text: Which of the following best describes the TOGAF Architecture Development Method?

discussion.content:
3.1.2.2 Characteristics of Governance

https://pubs.opengroup.org/togaf-standard/ea-capability-and-governance/chap03.html

Responsibility
Each contracted party is required to act responsibly to the organization and its stakeholders.
Fairness
All decisions taken, processes used, and their implementation will not be allowed to create unfair advantage to any one particular party.

questions.question_text:
Consider the following statements:

1. Each contracted party is required to act responsibly to the organization and its stakeholders.
2. All decisions taken, processes used, and their implementation will not be allowed to create unfair advantage to any one particular party.
3. Digital Transformation and operations will be more effective and efficient.
4. Strategic decision-making by C-Level executives and business leaders will be more effective.

Which statements highlight the value and necessity for Architecture Governance to be adopted within organizations?
